sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const SingleEvent = (props) => { const { eventID, eventImg, eventTitle, eventDate, eventLocation, eventType, eventStatus, eventDescription, eventCost, eventQuantityMember, eventBtnText } = props; return (
{eventStatus}
{eventType}

{eventTitle}

{new Date(eventDate).toLocaleDateString('vi-VN')}
{eventLocation}
{eventDescription}
{Number(eventCost).toLocaleString('vi-VN')} VNĐ
{eventQuantityMember} thành viên
{eventBtnText}
); }; export default SingleEvent;
